original_text: And when they had taken money as security from Jason and the rest, they let them go.
korean_text: 야손과 그 나머지 사람들에게 보석금을 받고 놓아 주니라

sentences.original_text: And when they had taken money as security from Jason and the rest,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 야손과 나머지 사람들에게서 돈을 보증금으로 받았을 때,
